definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
spirit trembling with excitement (idiom); in high spirits/lively and full of enthusiasm/full of energy/con brio
in high spirits (idiom); glowing with health and vigor
to gather one's spirits/to pull oneself together
old but still full of vitality (idiom)

sentences.english: It's great that we're seeing such community spirit sweeping the nation.
sentences.chinese: 这种社区精神遍及全英，真让人高兴。

sentences.english: Relaxing foods can enhance your mood and state of mind.
sentences.chinese: 放松食品可以改善你的情绪和精神状态。

sentences.english: Methods 37 cases of in-patients with schizophrenia were treated with Quetiatine for 8 weeks.
sentences.chinese: 方法对37例精神分裂症住院病人用奎的平治疗8周。

sentences.english: He was endowed with the spirit of self-sacrifice.
Creativity is the soul of the advertisement, which endows the advertisement with vitality and life.
sentences.chinese: 创意是广告的灵魂，是赋予广告精神与生命的活动。

sentences.english: Most states are Jacobin in spirit.
sentences.chinese: 大多数国家在精神上都是雅各宾。

sentences.english: Tommy said that he was dehumanized by his teachers, psychiatrists, and social workers.
sentences.chinese: 托米说他受到老师，精神病专家和社工的非人道对待。

sentences.english: He has done a great deal more years than many murderers, pedophiles and psychopaths .
sentences.chinese: 他的时间比许多谋杀犯，恋童癖者和精神病患者都多。

sentences.english: Summery:Poetry is a kind of art of language, and also implies profound scientific spirits.
sentences.chinese: 诗歌是语言的艺术，其本身又蕴涵着深厚的科学精神。

sentences.english: Patients with epilepsy or bipolar disorder can have difficulty swallowing tablets.
sentences.chinese: 癫痫病人或双相性精神障碍病人对吞咽药物有困难。

sentences.english: Objective To know the affection and related factors of neuroleptic to myocardial ischemia.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解抗精神病药物的影响及相关因素。

sentences.english: I've been tasked with psychoanalyzing Jack after his mental breakdown.
sentences.chinese: 我一直在负责对崩溃后的杰克使用精神分析疗法。

sentences.english: The strong pressure of public opinion has caused her nervous breakdown.
sentences.chinese: 强大的舆论压力导致了她的精神崩溃。

sentences.english: There are the Primavera youngsters who arrive here and acquire the mentality of a fantastic team.
sentences.chinese: 也会有青训球员一起训练，学习球队的精神。

sentences.english: Mendelian genetics in the setting of neuropsychiatry.
sentences.chinese: 神经精神医学中的孟德尔遗传学。

sentences.english: The key to success for Otis is team-work spirit.
sentences.chinese: 奥的斯的成败系于团队精神。

definition: the three energies of Chinese medicine: 精[jing1], 氣|气[qi4], and 神[shen2]
to develop/to make full use of
one's character/fret (on fingerboard of lute or guitar)
